contentList.content: Sneak Attack
Second-Story Work
Searing Smite
Shield Master (Shove)
Reckless Attack
Multiattack
Multiattack
Once per turn, you deal extra [1] when you attack with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> or target someone with one of your allies nearby.
You can use the Bonus Action granted by your Cunning Action to Help allies, Distract enemies or Throw an item.
You've mastered the art of falling and gain resistance to Falling damage. Also, you now use your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> to increase your Jumping distance.
Your weapon flares with white-hot intensity. It deals an extra [1] and marks the target with Searing Smite.
If you take the Attack Action on your turn, you can attempt to Shove with your shield using your Bonus Action.

Throw aside all concern for defense to attack with fierce desperation. Attacking recklessly on your first attack of your turn gives you <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on melee weapon <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> using Strength during this turn, but Attack Rolls against you have Advantage until your next turn.
While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Raging</LSTag>, you have Resistance to all damage except psychic damage.

While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Raging</LSTag>, foes have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag> against you, and you can use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> as a bonus action.
While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Raging</LSTag>, your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> increases by [1].
While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Raging</LSTag>, your jump distance increases by [1].

While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Raging</LSTag>, your allies have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on melee <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against enemies within [1] of you.
The badger makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
Jump (Thief)
Produce Flame: Hurl (Free)

Jump to a destination.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> affects how far you can jump.
End Short Rest
Dodge
Cunning Action
Cunning Action: Hide
Wild Shape: Wolf
Wild Shape: Dire Wolf
Remove Ensnared
Spend 1 Hit Dice to regain [1].
Ends the <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag> for you and your party members around you.

Until the start of your next turn, any <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against you has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>, and you make Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. You lose this benefit if you are incapacitated or if your speed drops to 0.
You can use your Bonus Action to Dash, Disengage or Hide.
Take the shape of a brown bear with high HP.
Take the shape of a wolf that can use its allies for advantageous attacks and leave its enemies vulnerable.
Take the shape of a dire wolf that can use its allies for advantageous attacks and leave its enemies vulnerable.
Bolster yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life to gain [1] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag>.
Once per day, during a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, you can replenish expended <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag>.
Once per day, during a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, you can replenish expended <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag>.
Make a Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against the caster's spell save DC to free yourself from the vines.

Dodge
Searing Smite
Distracted
Multiattack
You haven't spent any Hit Dice. You can spend up to [1] Hit Dice
You have spent 1 Hit Die. You can spend up to [1] Hit Dice
You have spent 2 Hit Dice. You can spend up to [1] Hit Dice
You have spent 3 Hit Dice. You can spend up to [1] Hit Dice
You have spent 4 Hit Dice. You can spend up to [1] Hit Dice
You have spent 5 Hit Dice. You can spend up to [1] Hit Dice
You have spent all of your Hit Dice ([1])
Taking a <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.

<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against you has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>, and you make Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>
Gained <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag>.
Your weapon flares with white-hot intensity. Your next attack deals an extra [1] and marks the target with Searing Smite.
The next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> not from the Distracted Source is made with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Has attacked recklessly. Enemies have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against them.
Free attack after using the first one.

You are Unconscious and must make Death Saving Throws. On 3 successes, you stop bleeding out and become Stable. On 3 failures, you die.
If you regain any Hit Points, lose Downed. If an ally Helps you and succeeds on their <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Check</LSTag>, you become stabilised and regain 1 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Point</LSTag> when Out of Combat.

Can't move or act. Attacks against a Prone creature have Advantage if they're made within [1] of the creature, otherwise they have Disadvantage.

A Prone creature must spend half its Movement Speed to stand up.
Wild Shape: Brown Bear
Wild Shape: Wolf
Shove (Push)
Shove (Prone)
Distract
Distract (Cunning Action)
Help (Cunning Action)
Shove a target to push it [1].
Shove a target. You can try to push it away or knock it prone.
Shove a target to knock it prone.

Feint, distract the target, or in some other way team up to make your ally's next <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> before your next turn have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Conjure ten magical berries for yourself or a companion. Creatures who eat a berry regain [1].
Burrow into the ground and emerge at the target position.

Help an ally in need.
Makes a <LSTag Tooltip="Medicine">Medicine</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Check</LSTag> to stabilise a <LSTag Tooltip="Downed">Downed</LSTag> character. Removes Burning, Ensnared, Entangled, Enwebbed, Prone, and Sleeping.
Entangled creatures are Restrained and can use their action to try and tear away the vines, making a Strength <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> against your spell save DC.
Shoving depends on your <LSTag Tooltip="Athletics">Athletics</LSTag>, and the higher of the target's Athletics or <LSTag Tooltip="Acrobatics">Acrobatics</LSTag>.
Throw (Item)
Throw (Cunning Action)
Throw (MainHand)
Throw (OffHand)

Throw an item from the floor or your inventory.

Your Strength affects how much weight you can throw. Heavier items deal more damage.

Throw an item from the floor or your inventory, without dealing damage as an improvised weapon.

Throwable items like grenades will still activate their effects.

Pick up an item and use it to make a melee attack.

Your Strength affects how much weight you can lift. Heavier items deal more damage.

Throw your main weapon.

Attacking further than the normal range ([1]) impose Disadvantage on the Attack Roll.

Throw your offhand weapon.

Attacking further than the normal range ([1]) impose Disadvantage on the Attack Roll.
Sneak Attack
Allows the usage of the Sneak Attack Passive
You can use the Bonus Action granted by your Cunning Action to Help allies, Distract enemies or Throw an item.
You've mastered the art of falling and gain resistance to Falling damage. Also, you now use your <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> to increase your Jumping distance.
Difficult terrain - <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is halved.
